description: Yua is one of the hit teen model in Japan. She striking look and her favorite catchphrase "Wassup" makes her fans strong. She appears in episode 35 of Shugo Chara!! Doki when Yaya finds a way to get Yua in Seiyo Academy. She really admired Amu from kindergarden, even if Amu was in first grade by that time, but Yua`s dream is her worst nightmare since wanting to become a singer brings back her traumatic past.
name: Sakurai Yua
